titles.title: Make Mention That His Name Is Exalted

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make mention that His name is exalted, Make mention that His name is exalted, For He hath done excellent things, This is known in all the earth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cry out and shout Thou inhabitants of Zion Cry out and shout Thou inhabitants of Zion For great is the Holy One, Great is the Holy One of Israel.{/lang-eng}
